Package Manual.services

Class ProgrammerService

java.lang.Object
Manual.services.BaseService<Programmer,​Long,​ProgrammerRepo>
Manual.services.ProgrammerService
public class ProgrammerService extends BaseService<Programmer,​Long,​ProgrammerRepo>
Class that models from ProgrammerDTO using ProgrammerMapper to be intermediary between the ProgrammerController and the database
Author:
sps169, FedericoTB
